name: Dash Karts
description:
A game made for SimpleJam 2016. Only one track in this build, but hopefully I'll find time to make more!

  1. Go around the track 3 times
  2. Go as fast as you can!
  3. Drift
  4. Drift
  5. Drift
CONTROLS (keyboard)
  • w/a/s/d: move car (a throttle, s is brake/reverse)
  • space: jump
CONTROLS (controller)
  • left stick: turn
  • right trigger: accelerate
  • left trigger: brake/reverse
  • a button: jump
